XII.i.3.F.5.a
.
VBMS Award Processing of DIC Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
Use the VBMS to process awards for DIC.
Reference
:  For more information on processing awards for DIC in VBMS, see the
VBMS Awards User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
